short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid a cluttered browser window by saving links and sessions to view later with one time access!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LaterLinks provides a quick and easy way to manage the pages you want to keep track of and access later. Once saved in the extension directly or by the right click context menu, the links are synced with your Google account for one time access when you want. Other functionality includes the ability to save an entire browser session as one link and the ability to add notes to saved links/sessions. LaterLinks also features a history of all previously saved links and sessions - from here, you can save multiple links at once to your Bookmarks.

NOTE:
Due to the limits of Chrome's storage across Google accounts, 512 is the maximum number of links that can be saved at any given time.
